content: welcome to week one of the 2023 wonderful hats crochet along today we will learn how to crochet the beautifully textured windermere beanie this beanie is worked from the brim up and features some of my favourite crochet techniques a free written copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported website https //richtexturescrochet com/windermere-beanie-crochet-pattern/ a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level intermediate gauge 17 sts x 12 row of front and back post double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 8 5 x 7 5 inches laid flat 20-22 inch circumference yarn impeccable by loops & threads ® 100% acrylic 285 yds/260 m 4 5oz/127 5 g 4 medium/worsted weight 1 ball per beanie hook size h/8 5 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge
